pages.text: $(li)The Frog Leg is an eatable item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/golden_frog_leg)Golden Frog Leg$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)Cooked Salmon satisfies five times more than a Raw Frog Leg.
